function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global pandemic of COVID-19 causing daily loss of lives and economic downturn","Impact":"Increased mortality, economic recession, and disruption of social and economic activities","Mitigation":"Strict public health safety measures, vaccination campaigns, and economic stimulus packages","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccination technology, and remote work technology","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and businesses","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and businesses"},{"Description":"Increased transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2 variants","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus and potential for exponential growth in outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring, travel restrictions, and public health education","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing technology, real-time PCR testing, and vaccine development technology","People":"General population, travelers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and government"},{"Description":"Psychological aversion to big crowds and necessary changes in public spaces","Impact":"Disruption of social activities and need for reorganization of public spaces","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements, redesign of public spaces, and promotion of outdoor activities","Technologies":"Remote work technology, urban planning software, and public space management tools","People":"General population, urban planners, and businesses","Owner":"Businesses, urban planning authorities, and local governments"}]}
